Description:
Model
Brand: CORSAIR
Model: CW-9060055-WW
Type: Liquid Cooling System


Block
Block Compatibility: Intel LGA 2066 / 2011-3 / 2011 / 1700 / 1200 / 1156 / 1155 / 1154 / 1151 / 1150

AMD AM4 / sTRX4
Block Material: Copper


Radiator
Radiator Size: 450.00 x 140.00 x 27.00 mm
Radiator Material: Aluminum


Fan
Fan Size: 3 Fan Slots (140 mm)
Fan Dim.: 140.00 x 140.00 x 25.00 mm
Fan RPM: 400 - 2000 RPM
Fan Air Flow: 97 CFM
Fan Noise: 10 - 36 dB(A)
LED Color: RGB via iCUE


Tube
Tube Dim.: 450mm Length
Tube Material: Black Sleeved, Low-Permeation Rubber


Features
Features: High-Performance RGB Pump Head: Powerful, low-noise cooling for your CPU, lit by 33 ultra-bright CAPELLIX RGB LEDs.

CORSAIR's Largest All-In-One Radiator: A massive 420mm radiator provides maximum surface area for extreme cooling.

CORSAIR iCUE COMMANDER CORE Included: A smart RGB lighting and fan speed controller gives you precise speed and lighting control for up to six RGB PWM fans. 

Magnetic Levitation RGB Fans: Three 140mm CORSAIR ML RGB Magnetic Levitation PWM fans deliver immense airflow to cool the most powerful systems with the latest high-performance components, with eight RGB LEDs per fan. 

Extreme CPU Cooling: Incredible cooling fan performance controllable via PWM, from 400 to 2,000 RPM while in operation.

All-in-One Automated Cooling: Everything you need to keep your CPU running at peak performance, including fans, coolant, and radiator, in a completely sealed system with minimal maintenance.

Zero RPM Mode: Zero RPM cooling profiles in CORSAIR iCUE software allow fans to stop entirely at low temperatures, virtually eliminating fan noise.

Powerful CORSAIR iCUE Software: Adjust fan and pump speeds, control and synchronize your cooler's RGB lighting with all iCUE-compatible devices, and monitor CPU and coolant temperatures, all from a single intuitive interface.

Split-Flow Copper Cold Plate: An optimal cold plate design and a high-density stack of 128 micro-skived fins-per-inch provides highly efficient cooling at all loads. 

Low-Noise Centrifugal Pump: Delivers a flow rate of up to 0.82L/min while generating less than 20 dBA, for extreme cooling with low noise. 

Easy to Install: Modular, tool-free mounting bracket for quick and painless installation on all modern Intel and AMD sockets.


Package Contents
Package Contents: CORSAIR iCUE H170i ELITE CAPELLIX Liquid CPU Cooler
CORSAIR Commander CoreMounting kit for all modern CPU sockets
Three ML RGB Series PWM 140mm fansFan and radiator mounting screws
Thermal compound (pre-applied)
Alternative Pump Cap
Cap Removal Tool
Quick Start Guide
Label: Líquida Corsair iCUE H170i Elite Capellix
